mapper.sql: x1.name ,x1.age ,x1.gender,case x1.gender when '1001' then '男' when '1002' then '女' else '人妖' end genderName ,x1.class_id,tbClass.name as className ,x1.create_time ,x1.update_time ,x1.is_deleted ,x1.id
from tb_student x1 left join (select * from tb_class where is_deleted=0) tbClass on x1.class_id=tbClass.id
